sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function CartModal({ cartItems, onClose, onCheckout, onUpdateQuantity, onRemoveItem, total }) { return (

Your Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

Add some products to get started!
) : ( <>
    {cartItems.map((item) => (

  • {item.name}

    ${item.price.toFixed(2)}

    {item.quantity}
    • ))}

Total: ${total}

)}
); }
